title: Mens Wholesale Jeans Pants, Classic Fit Relaxed Bulk Denim for Men, Assorted Sized Packs, Donation Homeless

BLUE ASSORTED MENS DENIM: Comfortable relaxed fit, perfect for wholesale use in which you need a variety of sizing.
EXCELLENT FOR HOMELESS SHELTER DONATIONS: Excellent for donating or events in which mens pants are needed in a variety of sizes. Jeans are a casual staple for men. Wholesale mens denim in bulk.
CLASSIC FIT: Straight leg, easy to get on and off. See sizing chart.
BILLIONHATS: We a variety of mens clothing and accessories for charities, organizations, non-for profits who need bulk apparel at great value.
